description.narrative: By end 2021 in targeted zones the DNTA, the divisions of the Ministry of Public Health and NGOs have the capacity to implement nutrition emergency preparedness and response for women, adolescents and children under five years

sector.narrative: Capacity building for nutrition preparedness and response
Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition

title.narrative: Chad Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Survival and Early Development)
Chad United Nations Development Assistance Framework

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By end 2021 in targeted zones the DNTA, the divisions of the Ministry of Public Health and NGOs have the capacity to implement nutrition emergency preparedness and response for women, adolescents and children under five years

description.narrative: The DNTA, the branches of the MSP and NGOs are better able to prepare an emergency nutritional response, thanks to the drafting of normative documents including the guide on setting up sentinel sites, the prior identification of areas at high risk of crisis, the development of a contingency plan, and the establishment of an early detection system for cases of malnutrition based on screening during lean periods. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:09/02/2020
